Class Flight

  • java.lang.Object
    • Login
      • Flight

  • public class Flight
extends Login
    This class implements a simple flight object which is used to search and find flights of diffrent airlines.
    Version:
    Sprint_1
    Author:
    Jose Delgado, Alexis Leon, Ajay Patel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Flight

        public Flight(java.lang.String airline,
              java.lang.String fname,
              java.lang.String ssn,
              double budget)
        This constructs the Flight object with the airline, first name, SSN, and budget.
        Parameters:
        airline - This is the airline from which the flight is being chosen from.
        fname - this is the first name of the person who wishes to take the flight.
        ssn - This is the social security number of the person.
        budget - This is the budget that the person has.

    • Method Detail

      • addCompanion

        public static void addCompanion(java.lang.String airlines,
                                double budget,
                                java.util.HashMap locations,
                                java.lang.String answer,
                                double cost)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.text.ParseException
        This Method adds a number of companions to the person in order to go on a flight. Along with adding companions to person this method will create tickets for each new companion.

        with each new companion budget from the original person will be decreased and will be checked to see if the person has enough money left over to book their companions flight.

        Parameters:
        airlines - Is the airline in which has been chosen
        budget - Is the Budget that person/user has
        locations - The Destinations they may go
        answer - The Chosen Destination
        cost - The Price of their flight
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.text.ParseException
        See Also:
        Reservations

      • lists

        public static java.util.HashMap lists(java.lang.String airline)
        This method only adds the flights to the designated airline(Data Structure)
        Parameters:
        airline - is the string argument given to the method in order to select which data is entered into the data structure.
        Returns:
        A HashMap with the resulting data according to the argument given to the method.

      • search

        public void search()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.text.ParseException

        This search method allows the person to search the different flights The person will first be asked to which airline they wish to search for.

        The results are returned depending on which airline they choose either delta or jetblue. If the person asks for an airline that is not part of the airport a message will be printed out stating this fact.

        once the person has chosen an airline and looked at the available flight, they will be asked to make a reservation or just say that they are looking around.

        If person chooses to make a reservation, the search method will create an object of reservation using the airline, first name, SSN, budget, and the map data structure for tickets

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Used in case of the an IO error and is handled to allow program form crashing.
        java.text.ParseException
